description:
In today's video Graham Cherry, arrives with two silage bale handlers to try out before we make the decision to purchase one, a big thanks to Cherry products, you can check their tele-handler and tractor attachments out here.

https://www.cherryproducts.co.uk/

Henry from Ernest Doe also popped in to help with the filming, and we tried both attachments before the emergency silage feed delivery, which is arriving tomorrow. Overall both attachments are of strong build quality, and both carry out the task of picking up silage bales without damaging the bales which is very important! The Manitou suited the attachments and i'm very pleased with how the day worked out, Enjoy! 

Support The Channel And Become An Olly's Farm Member -

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCLwRCh8kSqFRHe8pVhbsLlA/join

To see Olly's daily antics 

Snapchat Search - Olly's Farm

In today's video we're back on the land! Cultivating the ploughed land preparing it for drilling the 2021 spring barley crop. The Pottinger cultivator with the new points on worked really well and the packer worked well for breaking down the larger clods. Once the crop has been drilled it will then be rolled in with the farms set of rollers, this is to conserve the moisture. In today's video the topic of discussion is spring, the trees and hedgerows have been budding up, the wildlife is flourishing on the farm, with hares, deer, barn owls, robins, sparrows and much more, it's important to take it all in at this time of the year, we operate such busy lives in the western world and it's nice to be able to appreciate the seasons as they come around, Enjoy today's video!
